title: Litan
occurrences: Don't be scared! Today is Litan's day, everybody is thrilled!
Like every year on Litan's day, we're gonna chase the monster and catch it.
He's working on Litan's research center. He just did what Mr. Macel asked him.
I love speleology. Like many others in Litan. We even have a club.
And all my staff is gone. I can just tell you to run away from Litan.
You'd chose Litan's day to put us through this terrible ordeal,
